spell._comment: Names of spells which can be cast

waterring.name: waterring
waterring.description: trap your enemy in an aqua prison

meteor.name: meteor
meteor.description: what's the worse a huge lump of rock could do?

roots.name: roots
roots.description: trap your foe by growing roots at their ankles

tornado.name: tornado
tornado.description: throw everything into chaos with a tornado

mud_shield.name: Mud Shield
mud_shield.description: Bring up a wall of mud to block two attacks.
